item.title: Corinto
item.description: Price: £6.99 Date Purchased: 28th October 2014 Supplier: Direct Wine Shipments Region: Central Valley Chile We liked this Lots Description Deep brick red in colour with aromas of ripe strawberries and blackberries combined with dried fruit such as prunes, figs, and cherries. Soft attack on the palate that leads to a light well-balanced finish.
